name: Wordeus
description:
Discover WORDEUS! Wordeus, often presented as the new addictive game of the year is a fun innovative word game. Get yourself ready for addiction!

The rules are simple, in each level:
• 4 clue words are shown
• Find the secret word that makes 4 new words with the ones above
• No time limit

Example:
(note, board, set, word) -> (keynote, keyboard, keyset, keyword)
=> The answer is KEY!

Got it? Download Wordeus and challenge your brain with hundreds of enigmas and more every day.
